sentences.sContent: On the obverse, the traditional goddess of victory, holding a palm in her left hand and a winner's crown in her right.
sentences.sContent_eng: On the obverse, the traditional goddess of victory, holding a palm in her left hand and a winner's crown in her right.
sentences.sCn: 奖牌正面为传统的胜利女神。 她左手持棕榈叶，右手拿着胜利者佩戴的花冠。

sentences.sContent: On the obverse, an athlete standing on some steps, holding in his right hand a laurel crown, symbol of victory, and raising his left arm.
sentences.sContent_eng: On the obverse, an athlete standing on some steps, holding in his right hand a laurel crown, symbol of victory, and raising his left arm.
sentences.sCn: 奖牌正面为一名运动员站在台阶上，右手拿着一簇月桂花冠，象征着胜利，左手高高举起。

sentences.sContent: While Star Wars characters are depicted in colour on the reverse of the new coins, a traditional effigy of the Queen by the sculptor Raphael Maklouf dominates the obverse.
sentences.sContent_eng: While Star Wars characters are depicted in colour on the reverse of the new coins, a traditional effigy of the Queen by the sculptor Raphael Maklouf dominates the obverse.
sentences.sCn: 星战角色的彩照将被印在钱币的背面， 正面依然是雕塑家拉斐尔•马克鲁夫笔下的传统女王肖像。

synos.tran: 正面；对立面；主要的一面
正面的；[植]倒转的；对应面的

remMethod.val: ob(外) + vers(转) + e → 转向外的 → 正面的
